channel.title: College on Thomas' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in College on Thomas' Blog

item.title: Why most college students won’t make it in big tech
item.description: Most ppl in college don’t deserve big tech roles That includes me. At least, the version of me I used to be. Allow me to elaborate. There’s a weird sense of entitlement that creeps in when you’re pursuing CS, Design, or PM in college. It’s subtle but widespread. We tell ourselves we’re meant for FAANG simply because we want it badly. But here’s the truth: So does everyone else. There are millions of students around the world dreaming of the same outcome.
